xn__primvarsarnoldaov_t3ag.label: AOV Light Group
xn__primvarsarnoldaov_t3ag.help: Write out the light contribution to a separate AOV subset with a corresponding name. For example, all lights with this parameter set to "fill" will contribute to the "RGBA_fill" and "volume_fill" AOVs, which then contain a subset of the light from the RGBA and volume AOVs respectively. Emission from other sources and lights that have not been assigned an aov name will contribute to the "RGBA_default" and "volume_default" AOVs. All light AOVs can be output to a single EXR driver using output syntax like "RGBA_*". For the time being, light AOVs are only supported for volumes, and lighting from surfaces and the atmosphere will end up in the default light AOV. A maximum of 8 different light AOVs are supported, although a given AOV can contain a bundle of any number of lights.

tags.script_action:
import loputils
kwargs['ctrl'] = True
loputils.selectPrimsInParm(kwargs, False)
